desc.part1: An accredited school that combines the latest modern educational curricula, Islamic values, and the Arabic language, in a safe environment in the heart of Jakarta.
desc.part2: We offer early childhood, elementary, and middle school programs, applying an international curriculum (ICO) that supports critical thinking, values, and future skills.

vision.title: Inspiring Future Leaders through Values-Based Islamic Education
vision.desc:
To be a leading model in international Arab Islamic education, providing a high-quality educational experience that nurtures the child's mind, refines their behavior, and enhances their self-confidence.
We believe that every student carries unique potentials within them, and we are committed to embracing these individual differences to cultivate a creative, confident generation ready to face the challenges of the world with awareness and strong values.

mission.title: Empowering Youth in a Multilingual, Values-Based Setting
mission.desc:
We provide a warm and stimulating educational environment that integrates three languages (Arabic – English – Indonesian) within an Islamic values framework that promotes respect and openness to diversity.
We focus on developing the child's academic and personal skills, enabling them to express themselves, communicate, take responsibility, and contribute positively to their community and the world around them.

message.title: The director's word
message.subtitle: School Principal
message.msg_content:
“Dear Parents,
We are pleased to welcome you to the International Arabic School - Jakarta, where we build together the future of your children.
At this foundational stage of a child's life, we are committed to providing an education that connects values with knowledge, combines language with skill, and makes the child feel loved and safe. Our school is not just a place for learning; it is a second home for your children.
We believe that every child carries within them the seed of excellence, and our role is to prepare the right
environment for them to grow with confidence, independence, and joy.
Welcome to a warm, open, and renewing school community.“
